summary: There IS Such a Thing as Being TOO Early - AvaTaggart - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our...
title: There IS Such a Thing as Being TOO Early - AvaTaggart - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Izuku Midoriya shows up early to the UA Entrance Exam. So early that he winds up bumping into one of the recommended students.

Another fic for @lordlyhour‘s Alloy AU!

summary: If you’re still taking requests, could you do headcanons for Honenuki taking care of a sick s/o? If he’s too hard to write then...
question: If you’re still taking requests, could you do headcanons for Honenuki taking care of a sick s/o? If he’s too hard to write then maybe Shinso? Up to you tho!💚
answer:
hi love I don’t write for honenuki please make sure you read my rules! but I’ll write it for shinsou !

- Rika

Shinsou

💜 he will most definitely bring you soup and come over to your house

💜 “ why’d you have to get sick? “

💜 expect him to cuddle with you and give you lots of attention, he doesn’t like seeing you so frail

💜 you’ll try to tell him

you’re okay but he will not listen!!

💜 when you’re sleeping peacefully he’ll watch you with a soft expression on his face

- Rika

you’re okay but he will not listen!!

blog.name: multi-fandom-hcs
blog.title: Askbox- Open~
blog.description:
This is a Multi-Fandom blog dedicated to headcanons but random conversations are always welcome.

Requests: 7

Event: 7

summary: Is the ask box still open? If it is, can you write one where Dabi falls for the reader, but she likes Shouto?
question: Is the ask box still open? If it is, can you write one where Dabi falls for the reader, but she likes Shouto?
answer:
oh god, a love triangle…my worst enemy I hope this was ok~

Dabi

  • For Dabi to fall in love with a hero means you’re one hell of a person
  • Will always fight you but never actually hurt you, mainly taunting like a child
  • It would take Dabi some time to confess or try to confess, was it ok to confess to a hero? would you come to the dark side? a lot of questions would run through Dabi’s mind but soon he’d know what to do
  • He’d be terrorizing a plain dollar store knowing you would come…..eventually
  • When you finally arrived he saw someone else running beside you, someone he hoped he wouldn’t run into again…..Shouto
  • The fight went on like most fights would but this time there was a lot of ice involved and soon he just gave up and ran away, he was on a nearby alleyway observing you trying to figure out why Shouto of all people was with you that’s when he saw it…….the love in your eyes
  • Every time Shouto would move so would your eyes and just talking to him would make you blush, it was adorable but it made Dabi sick
  • After watching you two for around 5 minutes of “flirting” he couldn’t take it anymore and left
  • Dabi stopped terrorizing small stores and sometimes you wonder what happened to him but at the end of the day he’s a villain and your a hero.

  • Every time Shouto would move so would your eyes and just talking to him would make you blush, it was adorable but it made Dabi sick
  • After watching you two for around 5 minutes of “flirting” he couldn’t take it anymore and left
  • Dabi stopped terrorizing small stores and sometimes you wonder what happened to him but at the end of the day he’s a villain and your a hero.

blog.name: ellusquirk
blog.title: hi i'm ellie
blog.description: bnha, sds, khnm, opm | wattpad: elluspaghettu | requests: closed

summary: Can I get a male matchup please? I’m a girl, very short with red hair and freckles, and I am a dancer! I like to dance to pop...
question: Can I get a male matchup please? I’m a girl, very short with red hair and freckles, and I am a dancer! I like to dance to pop music, I also like to eat food and I can speak 6 languages. I am a little shy and I don’t smile and laugh much because I’m a little embarrassed, but I’m more open when I get to know someone and I love affection like hugs and hand holding. I don’t get along well with people who get angry a lot because I don’t like anger and it takes a lot to set me off. Thanks!
answer:
6 languages? that’s amazing! i can barely speak my first one properly haha! no problem sweetheart.

✎ Eijirou Kirishima

  • eijirou’s the one for you!
  • first and foremost, he loves you hair! he tries and dye his own hair to a similar red to yours so you can match. he loves to match with you - he thinks its super adorable! your hair is definitely his favourite thing about you and he especially loves running his hand through it. his hair can get really wiry from having to bleach his hair before dying it, so it’s nice to run his fingers through yours - its so soft and bouncy!
  • your freckles make him weak at the knees. to relax he tends to cuddle you and count your freckles, but usually he gets lost in your eyes and has to restart all over again. he loves running his thumbs over them and kissing them too. he just thinks they’re utterly adorable.
  • he’s definitely your biggest fan when it comes to you dancing. count on this guy turning up to every single dance performance you have and picking you up from late night rehearsals whenever there is one. he’ll help you practice, and probably end up doing embarrassing dance moves that have you keeling over with laughter. he’ll always praise you and gush about how talented you are. he’s so so proud of you and always makes sure you know that. sometimes he’ll put on music and start dancing, and encourage you to dance with him.
  • he’s fascinated by the fact that you can talk six languages, and he asks you to teach him bits and pieces from them so he can try and have a conversation with you in them, but usually he forgets. regardless he loves hearing you talk in different languages, he finds it incredibly attractive and is really proud of you for learning all six! its a fantastic demonstration of your dedication.
  • he doesn’t mind your shyness at all, but he does wish you’d smile more. he absolutely adores your smile and your laugh too and he’ll do whatever it takes to see it. he always reminds you of how gorgeous you are when you smile and how you shouldn’t feel embarrassed about it at all.
  • he loves when you get really affectionate - he’s happy to hug and hold you hand all day everyday. especially after a long day he loves to hold your hand as you two walk back to the dorms and snuggle down with you under a blanket and cuddle for the rest of the evening!

written on 28/04/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE MATCH-UPS ARE JUST FOR FUN AND IF YOU DON’T LIKE THEM I’M SORRY! I TRY MY BEST AND PICK SOMEONE BASED ON WHAT I THINK AND IF YOU DON’T AGREE THAT’S FINE BUT NO HATE PLS <3 I TRY MY BEST!

reblog.comment:

✎ Eijirou Kirishima

  • eijirou’s the one for you!
  • first and foremost, he loves you hair! he tries and dye his own hair to a similar red to yours so you can match. he loves to match with you - he thinks its super adorable! your hair is definitely his favourite thing about you and he especially loves running his hand through it. his hair can get really wiry from having to bleach his hair before dying it, so it’s nice to run his fingers through yours - its so soft and bouncy!
  • your freckles make him weak at the knees. to relax he tends to cuddle you and count your freckles, but usually he gets lost in your eyes and has to restart all over again. he loves running his thumbs over them and kissing them too. he just thinks they’re utterly adorable.
  • he’s definitely your biggest fan when it comes to you dancing. count on this guy turning up to every single dance performance you have and picking you up from late night rehearsals whenever there is one. he’ll help you practice, and probably end up doing embarrassing dance moves that have you keeling over with laughter. he’ll always praise you and gush about how talented you are. he’s so so proud of you and always makes sure you know that. sometimes he’ll put on music and start dancing, and encourage you to dance with him.
  • he’s fascinated by the fact that you can talk six languages, and he asks you to teach him bits and pieces from them so he can try and have a conversation with you in them, but usually he forgets. regardless he loves hearing you talk in different languages, he finds it incredibly attractive and is really proud of you for learning all six! its a fantastic demonstration of your dedication.
  • he doesn’t mind your shyness at all, but he does wish you’d smile more. he absolutely adores your smile and your laugh too and he’ll do whatever it takes to see it. he always reminds you of how gorgeous you are when you smile and how you shouldn’t feel embarrassed about it at all.
  • he loves when you get really affectionate - he’s happy to hug and hold you hand all day everyday. especially after a long day he loves to hold your hand as you two walk back to the dorms and snuggle down with you under a blanket and cuddle for the rest of the evening!

blog.name: midoriyas-quirk
blog.title: Days Without A Broken Limb: 0
blog.description: Hold your head up and plunge forward- the world is waiting to see you go! | First Year U.A. student, dating @todorokis-quirk | {asks always open; affilated with @hero-academias-quirk rp group! profile pic by @furanse}

question: ⏳
answer:
Send ⏳to hear what my muse would do if they were told they only had 24 hours left to live

What I would do with 24 hours left to live? Well, let’s see. I’d probably start by telling everyone how much I loved them. We’d probably all go out, shop around, go to an amusement park, and have a good time… then maybe go on a date with Todoroki, introduce him to my mom.. go to a petting zoo or a pet store and pet all their animals, maybe, or get Kouda to help me out there… and I think I’d end the day with a dinner with all my friends, my mom, and hopefully All Might…

…yeah. That would be perfect.
